info.name: Reloop Ready
info.author: Swiftb0y
info.description: feature-complete mapping of the Reloop Ready hardware. Development kindly sponsored by Samgarr

option.label: Use Button backlight
option.description: All buttons that have an LED will stay dimly lit even when turned off so they're easier to see in dark environments

option.label: Channel Knobs Assignment
option.description: Since the controller only has 3 buttons to map a three band EQ plus the Gain Knob, you can choose your preferred configuration here

option.label: Loop size of the smallest Pad in Auto-Loop (and similar) Padmodes
option.description: This specifies the smallest loop size, the larger loopsizes are automatically available on the other pads. This can also be changed on the fly using :hwbtn:SHIFT + "parameter adjust"

row.description: Since the tempo faders are cheaply constructed, on some units the physical indent representing the neutral position does not match the position where the value is actually neutral, this can be corrected here

option.label: Left Center
option.description: Input the parameter value from the developer tools here

option.label: Right Center
option.description: Input the parameter value from the developer tools here
